# AnchoringComponent.Target.HandLocation.HandJoint

**Structure**

Describes all the hand joints.

## Declaration

```swift
struct HandJoint
```

## Overview

For more information about the joints, refer doc://com.developer.apple/documentation/arkit/handskeleton

## Type Properties

- **forearmArm**: An anchor location at the elbow end of forearm on the back of hand.
- **forearmWrist**: An anchor location at the wrist end of forearm on the back of the hand.
- **indexFingerIntermediateBase**: An anchor location at the intermediate base of the index finger.
- **indexFingerIntermediateTip**: An anchor location at the intermediate tip of the index finger.
- **indexFingerKnuckle**: An anchor location at the knuckle of the index finger.
- **indexFingerMetacarpal**: An anchor location at the metacarpal of the index finger.
- **indexFingerTip**: An anchor location at the tip of the index finger.
- **littleFingerIntermediateBase**: An anchor location at the intermediate base of the little finger.
- **littleFingerIntermediateTip**: An anchor location at the intermediate tip of the little finger.
- **littleFingerKnuckle**: An anchor location at the knuckle  of the little finger.
- **littleFingerMetacarpal**: An anchor location at the metacarpal of the little finger.
- **littleFingerTip**: An anchor location at the tip of the little finger.
- **middleFingerIntermediateBase**: An anchor location at the intermediate base of the middle finger.
- **middleFingerIntermediateTip**: An anchor location at the intermediate tip of the middle finger.
- **middleFingerKnuckle**: An anchor location at the knuckle of the middle finger.
- **middleFingerMetacarpal**: An anchor location at the metacarpal of the middle finger.
- **middleFingerTip**: An anchor location at the tip of the middle finger.
- **ringFingerIntermediateBase**: An anchor location at the intermediate base of the ring finger.
- **ringFingerIntermediateTip**: An anchor location at the intermediate tip of the ring finger.
- **ringFingerKnuckle**: An anchor location at the knuckle of the ring finger.
- **ringFingerMetacarpal**: An anchor location at the metacarpal of the ring finger.
- **ringFingerTip**: An anchor location at the tip of the ring finger.
- **thumbIntermediateBase**: An anchor location at the intermediate base of the thumb.
- **thumbIntermediateTip**: An anchor location at the intermediate tip of the thumb.
- **thumbKnuckle**: An anchor location at the knuckle of the thumb.
- **thumbTip**: An anchor location at the tip of the thumb.
- **wrist**: An anchor location at the center of the wrist on the back of the hand.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
